content: in the beloved Star Trek episode the trouble with tribbles we're introduced
to the new TV and slime devil when they Klingon corax compares a Kirk to the
devil and an insult that Pavel check off is not too happy to hear but that was
interesting I mean Tsar Trekkies had no idea what it looked like but it just
kind of stuck with me I think at that point on Deep Space nine Keiko O'Brien
has a schoolroom that has a panel with a comparative xenobiology and you can see
the very right-hand corner there is a picture of the denebians slime devil and
this has taken all this artwork here on this panel is taken from the Starfleet
medical reference manual published in 1977 and this is what I based my denie
bein slime devil on hey guys here's my interpretation of the slime devil you
can see I have a back sloping head with tubes coming up the giant I imagine it
could breathe underwater or mud and I got this kind idea from the picture from
the medical manual some vicious teeth there and I was really going for a frog
like appearance which it seems to have like in the pictures from the medical
manual I made it slimy I give it some red color to denote the devil status
very powerful back legs that it could leap up in a surprise or pounce on prey
and there we go there's my interpretation of the denebians slime
